column4: Is anyone else trying to use a Keyword Search in Firefox for the Ubuntu Forums?
I keep having to delete and recreate my Keyword Search in Firefox for the Ubuntu Forums.  Does that happen to everyone who's doing that?
sounds like an issue for Mozilla channel
using compiz?
I had that same problem with many apps, til I shut off compiz
Thanks, but that thread just says to use procmail in some specific case.
the only other (non-bug) link I found was asking users to learn mutt :{
best ask that in #compiz-fusion
he was totally new to ubuntu
So, what makes it more difficult to install 64 bit for newbies?
flash for one
I thought that firefox plugin wrapper on 64 bit was supposed to work fine with flash?
any commands ;]
Like, there's no "Software Sources" dialog in 64 bits, so you have to use apt-get on the command line?
this is getting a bit offtopic..
actually folks here do know but this is not the 32/64 bit chat channel ;]
Jack_Sparrow: You guys need to read the channel topic.
haha
you have to get it from their site
Any idea why it's not in the repositories?  Like at least medibuntu?
dont know why
Thanks.
